actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to make the parents of any person who died in the active military, naval, or air service and whose remains are buried in certain national cemeteries eligible for burial in such national cemeteries.

summary.text: Authorizes the burial of the parents of any person who died in the active military, naval, or air service and whose remains are buried in national cemetaries. (Adds 38 U. S. C. 1002 (6)).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to make the parents of any person who died in the active military, naval, or air service and whose remains are buried in certain national cemeteries eligible for burial in such national cemeteries.
